cells.data: -- replicateM :: Int -> [a] -> [[a]]on replicateM(n, xs)	script go		script cons			on |λ|(a, bs)				{a} & bs			end |λ|		end script		on |λ|(x)			if x ≤ 0 then				{{}}			else				liftA2List(cons, xs, |λ|(x - 1))			end if		end |λ|	end script		tell go to |λ|(n)end replicateM
